# NSPanel

**Class**

A special kind of window that typically performs a function that is auxiliary to the main window.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class NSPanel
```

## Overview

For details about how panels work (especially to find out how their behavior differs from window behavior), see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/WinPanel/Concepts/UsingPanels.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/20000224].

## Configuring Panels

- **isFloatingPanel**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is a floating panel.
- **becomesKeyOnlyIfNeeded**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver becomes the key window only when needed.
- **worksWhenModal**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the panel receives keyboard and mouse events even when some other window is being run modally.

## Constants

- **Alert Panel Return Values**: These constants define values returned by the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSRunAlertPanel] function and by the `NSApplication` method [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/runModalSession(_:)] when the modal session is run with an `NSPanel` provided by the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSGetAlertPanel] function.
- **Modal Panel Return Values**: These constants define the possible return values for such methods as the `runModal...` methods of the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSOpenPanel] class, which tell which button (OK or Cancel) the user has clicked on an open panel.
- **Style Masks**: Constants that specify panel styles.

## Windows

- **NSWindow**: A window that an app displays on the screen.
- **NSWindowDelegate**: A set of optional methods that a window’s delegate can implement to respond to events, such as window resizing, moving, exposing, and minimizing.
- **NSWindowTab**: A tab associated with a window that is part of a tabbing group.
- **NSWindowTabGroup**: A group of windows that display together as a single tabbed window.

## Inherits From

- NSWindow

## Inherited By

- NSColorPanel
- NSFontPanel
- NSSavePanel

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSAccessibilityElementProtocol
- NSAccessibilityProtocol
- NSAnimatablePropertyContainer
- NSAppearanceCustomization
- NSCoding
- NSMenuItemValidation
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSStandardKeyBindingResponding
- NSTouchBarProvider
- NSUserActivityRestoring
- NSUserInterfaceItemIdentification
- NSUserInterfaceValidations
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
